name: MICHAEL: An AHS fangame [DEMO]
description:
The first playable demo of MICHAEL: An AHS fangame. 
This is, as the title states, an American Horror Story fangame.  It's based around the 8th season; AHS Apocalypse - though anyone  can enjoy it. 
This game has not been authorised or endorsed by Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk or 20th Television. This is a fan creation and is NOT a legitimate part of the series, please do not treat it as such.
